numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I noticed a difference between males and females in communication with parents.
2. In every category, males are less likely than females to reach out to their parents.
3. The categories are sending text messages and phone or video chat and personal visits.
4. About 50 percent of males send text messages to their parents.
5. About 70 percent of females send text messages to their parents.
6. About 30 percent of males use phone or video chat with their parents.
7. About 55 percent of females use phone or video chat with their parents.
8. About 20 percent of males visit their parents in person.
9. About 26 percent of females visit their parents in person.
10. I wonder whether young males consider communication a lower priority than young females consider communication.
11. I wonder whether the relationship between a young adult and the parents affects the response time.
12. I wonder whether young males communicate less in order to feel more independent.
13. This topic relates to me and my community.
15. People in my community are brought together by family.
16. Many family events happen in my community.
17. Family gatherings happen weekly in my community.
18. The headline is: 1,495 Young Adults Are They Really On Their Own?
